description:
Mahiro is a young boy who makes a deal with the sorceress http://anidb.net/ch47689 [Hakaze] in order to find the one who killed his sister and their parents. With Hakaze`s advice, he`s able to make use of magic through magic tools. He`s full of self-confidence and his actions often surprise others.
Source: ANN
name: Fuwa Mahiro
